H0.text: Which archipelago in the North Sea belonged to Britain until 1990 when ownership passed to Germany. Frisian Islands

H1.text: Which archipelago in the North Sea belonged to Britain until 1990 when ownership passed to Germany. Shetland Islands

H2.text: Which archipelago in the North Sea belonged to Britain until 1990 when ownership passed to Germany. Orkney Islands

H3.text: Which archipelago in the North Sea belonged to Britain until 1990 when ownership passed to Germany. Helgoland

A4.text: Heligoland was part of Britain from 1807 to 1890.

A5.text: British control of Heligoland lasted until 1952.

A6.text: 1951 news report about the civilian campaign to restore German control to Heligoland
